sentences: It is a great pleasure for me to bring the greetings of the Bank of Finland to the 150th anniversary of the Bank of Russia.
Our central banks are actually kind of relatives.
Emperor Alexander II founded the Central Bank of the Russian Empire exactly 150 years ago.
The Bank of Finland, for its part, was established by his uncle, Alexander I, in 1811.
So it is clear that we have many common roots.
I will return to these common roots in a moment, but let me first make some observations on today's international financial situation.
